overview: Adi Shamir is a physicist with over 12 years of experience as a high tech executive utilizing complex multi-disciplinary technologies. Prior to co-founding Panoramic, Adi was the product line manager at AeroScout, a company providing Wi-Fi based active RFID real-time enterprise location solutions. Formerly, Adi worked as the director of technical marketing at RFWaves (acquired by VISHAY, NYSE: VSH), a semiconductor startup developing short range wireless communications chipsets. Adi holds an M.Sc. and B.Sc. (cum laude) in Physics from Tel Aviv University specializing in electrodynamics. Adi is a co-inventor of several patents in the fields of RF antennas, RTLS system design and energy-sensing solutions.
